content: I think I might have misspoken about the 1982 penny. I acquired it through a trade with another collector, and I'm not entirely sure about its authenticity. I'll definitely look into getting it authenticated and graded by a reputable service. Thanks for the advice! By the way, have you heard about the new vinyl record store that just opened up downtown? I've been getting back into vinyl collecting lately, and I'm excited to check it out.
